Turn 1.description: Current (Lap 9) using sharper brake inputs vs Reference (Lap 8) progressive braking
evidence: Smoother braking typically yields better tire grip and corner entry stability

Turn 8.description: Current (Lap 9) made a sudden steering correction, likely due to missed braking point or compromised corner entry
evidence: Steering correction: 43.02 rate-of-change vs 8.26 on reference (2x higher)
Indicates: Late braking or missed turn-in point requiring correction

Turn 9.description: Reference (Lap 8) made a sudden steering correction, likely due to missed braking point or compromised corner entry
evidence: Steering correction: 27.82 rate-of-change vs 8.07 on reference (2x higher)
Indicates: Late braking or missed turn-in point requiring correction
